entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 17.

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
